days.title: Arrival & Shinjuku
days.description: Landing in Narita, taking the N'EX to Shinjuku. Checking into the hotel and exploring Omoide Yokocho.

days.title: Shibuya & Harajuku
days.description: Morning coffee, then walking through Yoyogi park to Meiji Shrine. Shopping in Harajuku and seeing the Scramble Crossing.

days.title: Asakusa & Skytree
days.description: Traditional vibes in Asakusa followed by futuristic views from the Skytree.
